title: 8: S5E08 – "Follow the Fear" – Scary Stories Told in the Dark
description:
In this episode of Scary Stories Told in the Dark, we bring you four terrifying tales from Evan Spry, Alex Taylor, and two anonymous authors, performed by host and narrator Otis Jiry, about vicious voices, deadly decisions, ruinous replications, and small town terrors.   
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
